Pre-Game Insights: Malawi host São Tomé and Príncipe on Thursday, June 6, 2024 then travel to Equatoria Guinea four days later in Group H of the World Cup qualifying matches for Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second-placed Flames started the World Cup qualifying race with an away 1-0 win in Liberia before losing at home by a similar margin to leaders Tunisia on November 21, 2023.
Others: Gabadinho Mhango dropped from Malawi squad due to unknown reasons.
Coach Patrick Mabedi released the 26-member squad on Sunday.
Richards Bay striker Khuda Muyaba and Black Leopards goalkeeper Brighton Munthali were also sidelined.
